metadata.title: Interactive Simulator Questions
metadata.description: Questions that dynamically affect which stages run in the simulation

questions.prompt: Does this project have existing code to work with?

options.label: Yes - modifying or extending existing system

yes.explanation: Reverse Engineering stage added to understand existing codebase before making changes.

no.explanation: Reverse Engineering skipped - no existing code to analyze.

questions.principle: Adaptive Depth - workflow adjusts based on project context

questions.prompt: Does this work include user interface changes?

yes.explanation: Browser Validation stage added to verify UI behavior. User Stories prioritized for UX flows.

no.explanation: Browser Validation skipped - no UI to validate.

questions.principle: Adaptive Depth - only run stages that add value

questions.prompt: Does this system handle sensitive data?

high.explanation: Full NFR stages + Security Review added. Compliance evidence required at all gates.

moderate.explanation: NFR Requirements added for security baseline. Standard depth applies.

low.explanation: Minimal security overhead - standard security practices apply automatically.

questions.principle: Risk-Based Depth - more rigor for higher-risk work

questions.prompt: How many people will collaborate on this work?

solo.explanation: Minimal ceremony - less coordination overhead needed.

small.explanation: Standard ceremony - balance of speed and coordination.

large.explanation: Full ceremony + Application Design - clear boundaries needed for parallel work.

questions.principle: Mob Collaboration - ceremony scales with team complexity

questions.prompt: What's the timeline pressure for this work?

options.label: Urgent - need it as soon as possible

urgent.explanation: Optional stages skipped to accelerate delivery. Risk accepted via expedited gate.

normal.explanation: Balanced approach - all recommended stages run.

flexible.explanation: Comprehensive testing added. All stages run at thorough depth.

questions.principle: Adaptive Depth - flex based on constraints
